project.name: GeminiHydra
project.description: Advanced 12-agent AI swarm system with PowerShell orchestration, React GUI, and Rust backend. Features self-healing protocols and intelligent task distribution.

hero.headline: The Witcher Swarm Awakens
hero.subheadline: 12 specialized AI agents. Self-healing protocols. Autonomous execution.

features.title: Self-Healing Protocol
features.description: Phase C automatic recovery. Agents heal themselves and redistribute failed tasks.

features.title: Runspace Pool
features.description: PowerShell parallel execution with intelligent load balancing across agents.

features.title: Vector Memory
features.description: Persistent agent memory with .serena/ knowledge graph and RAG retrieval.

features.title: Matrix Glass UI
features.description: React 19 + Tauri 2 desktop app with lazy loading and code splitting.

features.title: Rust Security
features.description: Tauri backend with memory-safe Rust for secure IPC and process isolation.

features.title: Live Monitoring
features.description: Real-time agent status, task queue visualization, and performance metrics.

v0Prompt: Create a Matrix-themed landing page for GeminiHydra - an AI agent swarm system. Use dark green/black theme (#0a0f0d) with neon green accents (#00ff41). Include: 1) Hero with animated matrix rain background, headline 'The Witcher Swarm Awakens'. 2) Agent roster grid showing 12 Witcher-named agents (Dijkstra, Yennefer, Geralt, etc.) with their roles and model assignments in glowing cards. 3) Features section with 6 cards using lucide icons (refresh-cw, git-branch, database, layout, shield, activity). 4) Architecture diagram showing PowerShell > React > Rust layers. 5) Terminal-style code snippet showing swarm initialization. Use JetBrains Mono font, glowing borders, and subtle scan-line effects. Responsive with mobile hamburger menu.
